p: Baba et al. ( 2017) investigated the effect of amodiaquine and other halogen molecules (fluorine, bromine, and iodine) against the replication of SFTSV in vitro. All the derivatives also displayed anti-SFTSV activity, and the IC 50 was 36.6, 31.1, and 15.6 μM for fluorine bromine, and iodine, respectively ( Table 1). Among the compounds tested, amodiaquine was identified as a selective inhibitor against SFTSV replication. The CC 50 and the IC 50 of amodiaquine was >100 and 19.1 μM, respectively. The IC 50 of amodiaquine was lower than those of ribavirin (40.1 μM) and favipiravir (25.0 μM).
